replies.author: pca006132
replies.txt_content:
标题: 来自Dinnerbone和Searge的五则信息 本帖最后由 cyqsimon 于 2015-9-11 02:51 编辑 

(标题那里对不起，因为看着5个信息我根本就不知道用什么标题好)






Searge:I found a way to improve rendering by building a chunk only once where it was rebuilt up to 5 times in worst case. Probably broke something.
我发现了一个改进渲染的方法，就是只建构每个区块一次，之前在最坏的情况下区块会重新建构五次。这可能破坏了一些东西
Searge:Such a peaceful scene. It almost makes me forget that we are working on "The Combat Update(tm)" right now. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/COiFmMeUAAAOy6P.jpg

Searge:真是一个美丽的景色。这几乎令我忘记了我们现在在弄"战斗更新"

Searge:We haven't decided if there will be a snapshot today (or this week) or if we should wait for next Wednesday and not release broken stuff now
我们还没有决定应该今天(或者是这星期)发布预览版，还是等待下个星期三才发布

Dinnerbone:It took *so much* work, but finally there's a gamerule "spectatorsGenerateChunks" (default true). It does what the name implies :)
这花了*很多*功夫，但是终于有一个游戏规则"spectatorsGenerateChunks"(预设为会)。它的作用就如同它的名称(观察者会生成区块)

Dinnerbone:With this, Hardcore mode will now turn you into a Spectator (that cannot generate chunks) after you die.
有这个，极限模式会在你死后将你变为观察者模式(这个不能够生成区块)

极限模式会在你死后将你变为观察者模式
我记得好象有个mod有这个设定
